elements.name: Login as a manager and try to refuse it

steps.name: User is on login page
User puts credentials in "username" and "password" box
User clicks on login button
It should navigate user to landing page
User clicks Expenses module at the top
It should navigate to Expenses page
Click on Expense Reports to Approve at the left side
It should navigate to Expense Reports to Approve page
Verify that there is a filter called To Approved
User should verify that there is a filter called To Approved
User cancels the filter To Approved option
User should be able to cancel the filter
User  verifies that all list of any kind of expenses should be displayed
User should be able to cancel the filter
User clicks on one of the submitted expenses displayed in the list

steps.name: It should navigate to page of that expenses
User verifies there is a Refuse button right next to Approve button
Refuse button should be displayed
User clicks Refuse button next to Approve button
User writes the reason of refusing
User clicks Refuse button in window
User clicks on Expense Reports to Approve again
It should navigate to page of list of all expenses
User cancels the filter To Approved option
Refused expense should be shown as refused int the list

name: Expenses Module
description:
Story:As a User have to be able to go to Expense Reports to Approve functionality and see all the
  Expense Sheet and refuse it.
